review: We are loving the fire stick, sooo user friendly and easy to operate!
author: Emily

review: Great system to access prime tv or Netflix with.  Received as a gift and we really like it.  Would recommend to buy.
author: K. Purchase

review: Have had it for only a couple weeks, but it works great !  It was a snap to install, and is easy to navigate....we are enjoying Amazon Prime offerings, and Netflix as well, since we have an account with them.
author: Maureen D. Attardi

review: Easy to setup and user friendly
author: Luis rivera

review: !!ATTENTION!! I gave this a two star rating because of the Best Buy store employee!! I just wanted something that would put my laptop screen onto my television period. The store employee lied and told me that this product did that. I wanted to play Youtube video's and this doesn't do that it just plays prescribed video's (on demand). I went back to thee store and asked for my money back. The employee that helped me with the returned item told me that I should have directed to just a cable not the Fire TV Stick. Grr!
author: clinton Allen

review: Easy installation but using for visiting family.  Thus not concerned with how to operate the device.
author: Rachel Kwarteng

review: This stick brings our TVs to life even without a cable or antenna connection.TH
author: T&S; Enterprises "th"

review: I am very happy with my Fire TV Stick. It was very easy to to set up and came with all the directions for use.
author: Marie Ballard "frogmem"

review: We are retired and it took no time at all to get it set up and going. We are both enjoying it a lot.
author: M. E. CULVER "Midge - Tacoma WA"
